questions.content: Level 0 of maturity allows to collaborate around a digital mock-up
questions.explanation: This is the traditional method of work, with a minimum contribution of digital

questions.content: BIM maturity level 3 is massively used by Construction actors
questions.explanation: We are still far from this level of maturity, for many reasons: conflicts between BIM softwares, hosting problems (can the blockchain solve this issue ?), IFC format...
